thread.title: BRIEF-Gansu-based firm files lawsuit against Hainan Yatai Industrial Development's unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gansu-based firm files lawsuit against Hainan Yatai Industrial Development's unit

organizations.name: hainan yatai industrial development co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Hainan Yatai Industrial Development Co Ltd
* Says a Gansu-based firm (plaintiff) filed a lawsuit against coâ€™s Lanzhou-based real estate unit
* Says plaintiff requested payment and related interest of 5.8 million yuan (with priority of compensation) and asked the unit to bear lawsuit related costs
